sentences.english: With its special location of Yueyang, its dialect is very complex.
sentences.chinese: 岳阳由于其地理位置的特殊性，方言十分复杂。

sentences.english: You may visit Yueyang and Dongting Lake.
sentences.chinese: 您在去北京途中可以游览岳阳和洞庭湖。

sentences.english: Regarding this time's Yoyang, emancipates the mind to come meantime on.
sentences.chinese: 对于这个时期的岳阳来说，解放思想来得恰逢其时。

sentences.english: Yueyang is a city by Dongting Lake in north Hunan.
sentences.chinese: 岳阳是湖南北部洞庭湖畔的一座城市。

sentences.english: Harmony is one of the six targets that develop Yueyang into a strong city.
sentences.chinese: 社会和谐是岳阳发展的六个强市目标之一。

sentences.english: Torrential rains hit Yueyang Thursday night, causing landslides in the village of Guanshan.
sentences.chinese: 暴雨袭击岳阳周四晚，导致关山村山体滑坡。
